name: 徐啟勝
objective: 本課程主要目的除了逐一介紹勞資關係各種常用方法之外，並針對每一方法提供了豐富的各種勞動法規應用範例，期望同學在修習完畢後，不僅了解勞動法規的主要方法，更重要的是讓同學藉由這些工具學習解決企業勞資關係問題的能力，對創造企業的競爭優勢有所認識。(This curriculum main goal besides introduced one by one the Industrial Relations each commonly used method, and aimed at each method to provide the rich each kind of Labor Laws, expected the schoolmate after repaired the custom to finish, not only the understanding Industrial Relations main method, more importantly let the schoolmate affiliation by these tool study solution enterprise Industrial Relations questions abilities, to created the enterprise the competitive advantage to have the understanding.)
